website_summaries.verdict: It's a reasonable choice if you're watching your budget and prefer its contemporary looks.
pros: Basic and practical pine wood crib
Meets safety standards and has 4-level mattress adjustment
cons: A few reports of an odor upon arrival and of paint imperfections

website_summaries.verdict: A crib made of safe material and easily adapts as your child grows.
pros: This crib is simple and modern, fitting flat against walls
Made with New Zealand pine wood
cons: May not withstand the effects of teething children

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this crib to use as a co-sleeper with a clingy toddler that was taking over the bed! It was builder friendly and works perfectly for what I needed it for. It's not strongest crib in the world, but it gets the job done. I did see a lot of bad reviews of how easily it chips and let me tell you, it has nothing to do with the fact that this crib is only $100 because the $500 crib we originally purchased for my daughter still chipped when she would bite it! Little teeth are SHARP!
customer_reviews.author: Guerrero Clan

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic crib for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my twins. I was looking for a gray crib that wouldn't break the bank. I was hesitant to order these because they were so cheap, like what's the catch? No catch in my opinion. They were easy to set up, are the perfect size and my twins sleep great in them at 4 months. We've had no paint peeling or other cosmetic issues. Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Erynn Baird

customer_reviews.title: Nice crib, poor conversion to toddler bed.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is now 15 months and while I still love this crib, after looking up the toddler bed conversion kit I'm a little disappointed. Most of the reviews hated the conversion kit. So for this reason we decided against turning the crib into a toddler bed, and instead we'll just be building a toddler bed. So overall if you just want a crib this one is great and pretty easy to assemble. But if you're looking for something truly convertible maybe consider your other options.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Crib
customer_reviews.text: Horrible crib.The design is flawed. Took 2 people 3 plus hours to assemble it. Somehow the screws were too long and so it ripped open the other side of the stands of the crib when we joined them with the base as in the video. We initially put duct tapes around it to cover the ripped up sharp wooden pieces as it had taken so much time to assemble it and we thought it would be too much trouble dissembling it and returning it. However, now that we think about it again it is a safety issue and we would not keep it even if it is free.
customer_reviews.author: Thupten

customer_reviews.title: Fumes
customer_reviews.text: This crib was manufactured 4 months before I opened it. Once opened, I let it air out for 3 weeks in the garage. I finally put it together and the paint/finish fumes in the nursery are sickening. Now I need to figure out how to send it back without a box.
customer_reviews.author: Bamazon

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: We bought this so that we could have a crib in our room and one in the nursery. This one doesn't take up much space so we love it for our room. It's not the highest quality crib...the wood is lightweight... but its about what I expected. It looks pretty good and you sure can't beat the price (it was less than $100 when I purchased it). I see no reason why it wouldn't last for years to come with normal use.
customer_reviews.author: ETop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely hate this crib. The pictures do not actually show how it looks. The wood is not flush at all. You can see all sqrew holes as well as where the staples are. Mine already had tons of scratches. It is really short. The instructions were easy to read. I just don't like the style. I kept putting it together last night to see if it would change. But the more I put it together the more I hated it. I wish I hadn't put it together already so I could return it.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Morgan Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Bed fell apart not safe!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like the bed But its reall small your child will only be able to sleep straight if you have a child that like to flip around and move around during the night this is not the bed it's a way to small my childs feet and legs has to hang out the crib Update!!The bed completely fell apart all the screws came out the bed and the bed is falling apart it is not safe do not buy the bed!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Hi there

customer_reviews.title: Good crib, no flaws seen, clear instructions
customer_reviews.text: This crib only took about an hour or so to put together by myself. The instructions were very clear and all the parts were there. If you ready the instructions it tells you to check to make sure you have the correct number of bolts and pieces, as they have a few different sizes depending on where you are suppose to put them (mentioning because of previous reviews). We had no scratches or marks on ours. It seems like it will be a good crib. I cannot speak to how well it will hold up once it's in use (we have not had baby yet). It seems sturdy enough.
customer_reviews.author: Queen AP

customer_reviews.title: ... crib for 11 months - it has been a great crib for the price
customer_reviews.text: We've used this crib for 11 months - it has been a great crib for the price. We love the style and the size - it is a short modern style crib and looks adorable in our baby's room. The only thing we've not loved about it is that as our baby has grown and as she stands and pulls on the bars - the screws loosen - we are continually tightening them and making sure they stay tight so the crib stays sturdy. I have never had to do this with any other crib for my other children so I don't enjoy the constant maintenance. Gray color is dark and has held up well with wear
customer_reviews.author: S Mellor

customer_reviews.title: UNSAFE MATTRESS SUPPORT!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this crib no stars, I would. The crib looks aethetically pleasing and the price seems right. However, after a month of laying my 4 month in it, the support for the mattress is bowing in the center. He is now 5 months and 16 lbs. Regardless of the weight of my 5 month old, it shouldn’t do this as it’s marketed as a convertible crib. The bowing poses a major safety issue as baby cannot roll out of the dip in the center easily. I don’t even know how this item is being sold as I’m sure it can’t pass JPMA standards for safety with how flexible the support is.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Adams

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to assemble, but did take some time as the pieces are a bit strange and have to line up correctly. Took my husband about an hour to do the entire thing. The pieces are a lot lighter than I thought they’d be. Overall the whole thing is a very lightweight crib. I can’t speak on durability as we haven’t yet had our baby. I’m thinking it’s going to be safe just from the setup, but definitely you get what you pay for. This is NOT heavy duty, but is secure when we wiggle it...will update after use with the baby. Overall, I’m pleased so far.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great Price and easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived well packaged and very timely. My husband put it all together within 30mins. Easy instructions to follow he said. They grey color is great! Very light weight too. Our 6 month little one is very active and moves all around her crib. A couple times she got her legs stuck in the slats, so we decided to put mesh crib bumbers,, around it which are breathable and will help to keep her from getting a leg or arm stuck again. Overall great price for this crib, but more importantly overall we feel assured she will be safe in it.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Welch

customer_reviews.title: but really needed something easy to assemble and disassemble with different guests
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for grandma and grandpas house. We didn't need an everyday crib, but really needed something easy to assemble and disassemble with different guests, lightweight enough but still sturdy to keep a wild toddler in. This is awesome. The grey is as pictured. The crib rails are slightly lower than the crib we have at home but no climbing, so that's fine. It's pretty sturdy especially for the price. I'm really thrilled with this purchase and I'd recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SHSTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Love this crib for our 11 months old daughter. Had to find a longer than standard size baby mattress, but that was easy enough to find at Target. Wife picked out the crib. We’re happy with the size and sturdiness. Was easy to lower the mattress down to the bottom level after our daughter grew taller.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble. Chic and modern!
customer_reviews.text: These are so adorable!!! We got two for our twins nursery and my husband had both of them put together in under 40 minutes! They are shorter in my opinion then other cribs we have had in the past for our other children but not awkwardly short. Just noticed that they weren’t very high off the ground but that may be handy when the babies start trying to climb out! I love how mellow the grey looks and how modern they look. Very affordable and cute!!
customer_reviews.author: samantha nelson

customer_reviews.title: Love it and will purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the crib overall. My only complaint is assume of the crib bars are a bit rough rather than smooth. I don't feel it is rough enough to pose a threat. The crib is shorter in height than other cribs. That can and to me is a plus, if you are on the shorter statue as well as less danger. If your child was to climb out as mine had 9n the past.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby Rose

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I should of saved up to get a much more sturdy crib . This one is extremely wobbly and I felt like I was cracking the fake wood or whatever the heck it’s made out of every time I screwed a screw. It’s so cheaply made . I have 4 kids Iv had multiple cribs and this is by far the worst .
customer_reviews.author: Tracie

customer_reviews.title: Great crib at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I have friends who have spent more than double to buy "nice" cribs than we spent on this one. Honestly, there is no difference in quality. This crib is sturdy, easy to build and looks nice. We wanted a simple style crib, and it fits our nursery perfectly. It didn't take long at all to build, and I love that the height of the mattress adjusts. So far I don't really have anything negative to say. Save money! Buy this one, and I don't think you will be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Straight forward directions but might need 2 people
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to put together single handedly, but definitely would have been easier with 2 people. No extra tools required. As other people have mentioned there were some stickers that didn't peel off, but nothing some baby oil couldn't handle. Looks nice and feels very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Great for price
customer_reviews.text: This crib is great! We purchased it for our LO's room at Nana's. Needed something for a small room that can be used as a toddler later on. It's light weight and was easy to put together. Used a standard mattress (they note that it should not be more than 6" thick. Would definitely suggest as a $$ saver for a nursery or second room. We will be getting a teether cover for the rails though, before he chews the paint off.
customer_reviews.author: Mar A

customer_reviews.title: it's probably best for a child that's way less than 2
customer_reviews.text: It's a quite flimsy crib comparing to some other brands. it's probably best for a child that's way less than 2. my son is 20 months and that thing is just not solid enough for him. fortunately it's just a "vacation temporary crib" for him that stays at our second house... we're rarely there, but it was cheaper to have one there than drag a playpen and pay airlines 25$ each trip..
customer_reviews.author: Jag B.

customer_reviews.title: Loving my new crib! Great for the cost
customer_reviews.text: This crib looks like great quality! It is lightweight and the perfect gray color! It was easy to put together, and fits in smaller spaces. I don't have the baby for it yet, but I will update my review after I have been using it for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great crib!! Modern, easy and baby sleeps great.
customer_reviews.text: I had a similar grey crib that I had to get rid of because of chipping paint. This crib hasn't had any chipping paint and is so durable! The grey looks so modern in our bedroom. Baby sleeps wonderful. Got it on sale, one of my best Amazon purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy it again
customer_reviews.text: It was so small I was not expecting that. The baby can actually move the Crib. She can actually push this crib around MY ONE YEAR OLD! Cheaply made I wish I had spent the extra $50 or $60 ang got a better crib. Waist of money if your gonna spend money on this just get a good up portable crib same difference.
customer_reviews.author: chi uyen nguyen

customer_reviews.title: it’s convertible and the part that converts it isn’t even included you have to buy it separate
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t come with the part that converts it . Which is annoying
customer_reviews.author: Aggie G.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this crib for about two months now. No paint chipping but my boy can't pull himself up yet so we'll see when he becomes a piranha. Husband put it together in no time at all and it is very sturdy. I like that it is short because it makes it easier for me to put him down, I'm 5'1".
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these due to having twins. Got the first one put 95% together and found that the one hole didn't have threads. Contacted Amazon I had a replacement the next day(saturday) and a pick up set up for monday. The replacement and the second bed had no issue. I myself (female) put most of the second crib together by my self. Did need help for sides and the piece that holds the mattress. Very nice over all.
customer_reviews.author: Harley

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My husband assembled in about 45min. He said there was a manufacturer's error with the hole placement but he worked it out. Other than that the bed is pretty sturdy and my LO loves it already
customer_reviews.author: BlueJaye

customer_reviews.title: Decent crib for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not a fancy crib by any means. However, it’s a very functional crib. No complaints for the price I paid. If you are looking for an inexpensive crib, this one definitely works. Probably not instagram worthy but it’s practical.
customer_reviews.author: Jina

customer_reviews.title: Good option for a basic crib
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cute crib. I was looking for something on the small side so I like how basic it is. When it came my husband wasn’t home so I put it together on my own and it was no big deal. It’s bit the highest quality, but for the price it’s a good buy. It fits a normal sized crib mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Wuori

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: Awful item. Went to put it together and the holes were defective. Ended up shearing a bolt completely off trying to get it together. Don't waste your time or money
customer_reviews.author: Denea

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP PAINT
customer_reviews.text: Bed looks nice, sturdy. Unfortunately my son is teething and within a few days has bitten the paint off top of this crib. Would not recommend to another parent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and handsome
customer_reviews.text: This crib is sturdy and handsome. The only reason I rated a 4 star is how annoying it is to hang the mattress holder. There has got to be a better way to install those things, or companies should send allen wrenches that fit the project easily. Otherwise, now that it's assembled, I am pleased with the final product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Crib
customer_reviews.text: I needed this bed because my grandchild was growing. Putting it together was not hard. The crib is sturdy and looks nice. It was made in Taiwan! Hooray!
customer_reviews.author: M. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Easy assemble
customer_reviews.text: I was a little sketchy about getting this crib but I didn’t want to spend so much on a crib that’s really only going to be used for like 2 years or less. Putting it together was super easy! The color I picked goes with all of the stuff I have at home.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Nice crib/Difficult for 1 person to put together
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice crib for the price! My husband worked to put it together but needed some help from me(32 weeks pregnant). Be aware it may take 2 people, the springs are difficult to put in with only one person. He said he is not looking forward to moving the springs downwards as baby grows. Still good for the price, no flaws with shipping and love the grey color! Baby has not used it yet, but love having it ready!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Linam

customer_reviews.title: Great crib
customer_reviews.text: Overall great crib. My daughter slept in it for 3 years. And boy did she put it through the ringer. She used it as a crib and a "day bed" Very easy to put together, I took it down and put it back together at least 7 times and my daughter jumped on it religiously and it never fell apart or broke. Fantastic crib and very pretty color.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our needs!
customer_reviews.text: Great crib! Easy to put together. Wood is soft, so once your babies grow some teeth and begin standing and reach the top rail, prepare for some knawing! So look out for rail guards to pair with this crib
customer_reviews.author: C. Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This crib is perfect for a small space. Easy to put together, sturdy. Easy to take apart and move. If looking for a smaller crib this is the one, while it still maintains safety. Compared to more expensive cribs (2 that I purchased) this one is the easiest to use.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Absolute garbage do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this. It is complete garbage. The wood splintered when screwing in while we were putting it together. Safety hazard. Don't buy this.
customer_reviews.author: MNXtizzy

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. I bought this so my son would have a place to sleep at my in-laws. My mother-in-law and her 12yr old were able to put it together without any issues. The only thing I find odd is that even with the mattress on the lowest level is still seems a bit high. Other than that it is great and I really like the gray color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: This was pretty easy to put together if you can follow written directions. I don’t find that it chips & my daughter spends enough time in it & with her mouth on the bar to know. It gives more of an up to date look just because it doesn’t have that high headboard lol I love it
customer_reviews.author: TNM

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Great Value
customer_reviews.text: All we cared about was a clean design and affordability. We’re only going to have the crib for a couple of years. We wanted a no frills deal that was safe for our baby. So far so good, baby sleeps swaddled and soundly.
customer_reviews.author: jennreadsfiction

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a decent crib. A little frustrating to assemble but should anyone be surprised that these things are? So far so good overall!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The perfect crib if you have limited space!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this crib! We have another da vinci crib in our baby's room which has a bulkier design especially with its bottom drawer. We needed another crib in our room so our little angel can stay with us at night. I was looking for a crib that's slim yet very sturdy and this is the one! It's very high quality, sturdy but with slim rails with a very basic design.
customer_reviews.author: Iris L.

customer_reviews.title: I don't think I will be comfortable using this crib past 9 months or whenever my ...
customer_reviews.text: This crib is very flimsy. As a mom of three, I don't think I will be comfortable using this crib past 9 months or whenever my baby starts standing and jumping. I would definitely suggest spending more on a crib if you plan on using it every day...this may be an ok, affordable option for a Grandparent or someone else that only needs a crib for ocassional use.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Louise

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: This crib was very easy to assemble and is really cute. I love the simple design and the grey color. But sadly after 8 months of use it’s pretty scratched up and doesn’t seem as stable. We’ll probably have to get a new one or transition our baby to a bed sooner than we would like
customer_reviews.author: Bethany W.

customer_reviews.title: Great crib for a low price
customer_reviews.text: Great crib for the price I bought 2 they are a little difficult to assemble but just be sure to have extra set of hands
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Appalled
customer_reviews.text: Appalled!!! We have had the crib slept in for 16mos. It was supposed to last thru a bed set up. The twins could have been injured badly. My mom bought the other one and that frame broke around the same time. Do we get two frames sent to us?????!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Legs get stuck easy
customer_reviews.text: Out of 4 cribs and 4 kids this is the first crib that I've owned where my childs leg constantly gets stuck in the rails. Its not just once in a while its every single time. Ordered something to hopefully prevent this otherwise I'll just have to buy a different crib.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this crib as a second crib. The quality is poor, and feels rickety. Ok for minimal use, I wouldn’t purchase this crib as the primary bed for my child. Support and QA isn’t much better either. It was missing a bolt/screw. After two weeks I’m still waiting for the missing bolt to arrive. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Graham

customer_reviews.title: Best strong and easy to mount crib..... Love It
customer_reviews.text: Simple.... strong.... elegant.... good quality.... I just love it i decide to purchase these crib just beacuse i need something small but at the same time with a good quality wood. Is was very easy to mount. I recommend a 5 inch matress for it. My walls are painted grey so i decide purchasing the gray color crib and it just look awesome but be careful the paint is not so good so any scratch will remove it
customer_reviews.author: Efrain Santana

customer_reviews.title: Great basic crib
customer_reviews.text: We love this crib! Very easy to put together, I did it myself. It only took me about an hour. It’s the perfect height for me (5’3”) so that I don’t strain my back putting my baby in, or have to get on my tiptoes to set him down. The color is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small spaces!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this crib.. Baby doesn’t come till next month but we are very happy we decided to purchase this cute crib and great for a small space love the gray color to
customer_reviews.author: Ravin

customer_reviews.title: Great for a small space
customer_reviews.text: Overall nice crib but made with cheap material. You have to be careful when tightening the screws because it is very easy to over tighten and cracked the wood. But this crib is definitely good for a small space and young infant. But as they get older I would not recommend it because it doesn't seem that's sturdy for a toddler.
customer_reviews.author: jake

customer_reviews.title: So cute and nice quality
customer_reviews.text: This crib is beyond affordable, has very few pieces (I put together in 10 minutes without looking at the directions but maybe once), is sturdy and takes up little space. It was a lot smaller than i expected (still a full size crib) which i actually love because it takes up very little space in my room and I don't have to strain to reach in and out (I'm 5'5") making it perfect for shorter moms or those with c sections. But dont worry, with the mattress fully dropped there is still plenty of room for baby to be safe as they grow too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to put together came right on time. Love the color! And its perfect! Easy to move around its light enough to slide by myself at 6 months pregnant all the hard ware was there and came with a mail of for if there is ever a recall or issue which was nice. directions were easy to understand and clear to read 😀
customer_reviews.author: Ashe W.

customer_reviews.title: functional and super sturdy. Set up took me and my wife ...
customer_reviews.text: Simple, functional and super sturdy. Set up took me and my wife roughly 25 minutes. Would have been less but we installed the sides wrong and had to flip it but other than that super simple to put together and everything is lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Quality Crib, very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I had read all reviews for many cribs before deciding to purchase this one. First it shipped quickly and arrived on time and in great condition. No chipping paint or broken parts. Secondly the assembly for this crib was so easy! It took about 30 minutes to get everything all secured. The instructions were easy to follow. If you are thinking of purchasing this crib, I'd say do it. It's going to work very well for us. Pleased customer.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something simple, small, lightweight, inexpensive and easy to assemble and that's what I got. I'm very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Duncan

customer_reviews.title: A Breeze
customer_reviews.text: I have twins so I never have much time on my hands so I need a crib that was quick to assemble. I put two of these cribs together in less than hour. Sturdy crib and a great size. I would highly recommend this over any Grayco Crib .
customer_reviews.author: Raleigh919

customer_reviews.title: 2019 review!
customer_reviews.text: For 100 bucks is a good stable crib for newborns to 2 toddlers. I wouldn't recommend for 2 and up It can break easily if you baby wild & heavy lol Easy to assemble. Love the color gray . Arrived 2 days with prime.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This crib really is pretty nice for being relatively inexpensive. It is easily put together, looks attractive (just like the picture), came with all the pieces and nothing was nicked or damaged. The packaging of it was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Carolynn

customer_reviews.title: Great crib for the money
customer_reviews.text: We like this crib and feel that it is a good value. It was not hard to put together. However, check the screws for tightness every now and again. We have had this crib for 4 or 5 months and noticed yesterday that one of the screws on the front rail had backed almost all the way out. Also, consider getting a rail guard of some kind as teething babies love to bite on the top of their crib.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Surpassed all expectations
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this crib for 18 months now and I am beyond happy with it. It was easy to assemble. It’s sturdy. It’s lightweight enough that I can move it as needed. It’s simple. It’s attractive. It’s absolutely perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: As pictured!
customer_reviews.text: Has stood up to the abuse of our toddler. Love the simple look. Not too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Haley M.

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but wasn’t safe for our family
customer_reviews.text: Not very good... screw loosened after just 2 nights. Daughter climbed out, 1st and only crib that’s ever happened, she fell on her face!
customer_reviews.author: Gardencourt

customer_reviews.title: Nice basic crib
customer_reviews.text: Perfect basic crib. Easy to assemble. I purchased the graco foam mattress as well. It fits in the crib just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made...I can tell this won't last very long for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this simple crib. Looks great in my baby's nursery. Very easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: Alesha Weigl

customer_reviews.title: Not for a toddler
customer_reviews.text: The crib states is convertible but it did not bring the small side part to make it a toddler bed.
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa Mazariegos

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal! Lasts long!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this crib for all my kids. Very safe and very sturdy. It's worth every dollar.
customer_reviews.author: mary rogers

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to set up - doesn't even use any barrel nuts. The nuts are already embedded in the wood so you literally just zip the screws in with your drill (with allen head bit) and this is ready to go. Easy to adjust height for when baby gets older. Seems like a decent unit for the money.
customer_reviews.author: C. S.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this gray crib that will make into a youth bed too.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this crib for a growing grandson with the idea that it will be a good child's bed. It was very easy to put together and is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: My son hasn’t used this yet, but I love it for far. Very cute and simplistic, and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Awesome crib
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to put together and took about 20 mins to do so. It looked cheap and was skeptical when purchasing but I'm glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Dempsey

customer_reviews.title: Cheap materials, very basic design.
customer_reviews.text: As basic as it gets. Not too durable. We got the gray color. Paint is pretty poor. I think thisnis way overpriced when compared to the quality.
customer_reviews.author: ALPHAGUY

customer_reviews.title: easy to assemble, looks great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great crib. Low to the ground, beautiful color. Easy to put to together, my husband surprised me by assembling it white I ran to the grocery store. He said it was super easy. It seems pretty solid. Our nine month-old likes it. We've only been using it for about two weeks so here's hoping it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Belanger

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deal
customer_reviews.text: Tremendously satisfied with the crib. For the price it is totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: FLA48

customer_reviews.title: Paint chips
customer_reviews.text: The paint chips off easily with a few quick chomps. The product description doesn't offer much info about the paint, aside from saying it's lead-free. I hope that's accurate!!
customer_reviews.author: Steigerwald

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I am using this as a co-sleeper and I love it. It fits perfect and is in really nice shape. I was worried because the price was low I was going to get a junk bed but that was NOT the case at all we love it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Pugh

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. As others have noted, the color is a bit darker gray than it appears on my monitor, but it is a very attractive color nonetheless. Lower than I had expected, but that is actually a plus for me. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bed!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful love this bed shipping was fast and bed it’s just what we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Breedlove

customer_reviews.title: Shorter than expected.
customer_reviews.text: It's a lot shorter (lower to the ground) than I expected. However, I'm 5'4" so it works perfectly! I love it. It's very simple and goes perfectly for my son's room.
customer_reviews.author: Laurena

customer_reviews.title: Good value crib
customer_reviews.text: Simple crib was easy to assemble and works great for an everyday crib or as a crib at the grandparents’ house.
customer_reviews.author: Christine R

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly, great quality for the price. The product comes with everything you need to put it together. I was able to assemble it in under an hour, alone and with two kids trying to “help.”
customer_reviews.author: TDalton

customer_reviews.title: Does the job for the price
customer_reviews.text: We use this at my parents house when we visit. It’s a lightweight crib. We had to put a rug underneath one leg (at least) to keep it from sliding on hard wood floor. Does the job.
customer_reviews.author: C Monse

customer_reviews.title: Dos
customer_reviews.text: This bed does not come with the toddler bed rail!! It is advertised as a 3 in 1 but you must buy the rail separately for an additional $60.00. I do like how slim and simple this bed is. It’s not big and bulky like many others but the pre assembled parts aren’t even lined up correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Zac

customer_reviews.title: Great price-- nice crib
customer_reviews.text: Great price-- nice crib.. We haven't used it yet but it was a breeze to put together, came in perfect condition. I really wanted a grey crib and others were $200-300 more and, turns out, made of the same materials. Only concern, it seems a little low to me, I am 6' tall and this crib looks low, though I have no crib experience so it might be normal.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: My Baby isn't here yet but I just got this crib together and it's only downfall so far seems to be how short it is so I will need to move the mattress down sooner than I did with my older kids crib. I will update the review if anything changes after he uses it but I love the grey finish.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Are you short? Buy this crib!
customer_reviews.text: What a cute crib! I'm 5'4 and was worried about the height of the crib but I bought it going off of a few reviews saying thay they are short and they can reach into it just fine. They were right. Its nice and low, I can reach comfortably in to my baby. Quality seems good too and I got the grey color, it looks very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great crib for the value
customer_reviews.text: This crib has been a tremendous value and has held up extremely well. We've had it almost 2 years now and it still looks brand new! It has had to be tightened a couple of times but, that is to be expected. Plus I've had a toddler and a preschooler jumping on it. We currently have it as a toddler bed and I'm impressed with how low to the floor it goes. My son could fall off and not get hurt or be startled out of sleep. I highly recommend this crib for anyone who wants a great looking crib at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: felicia smiley

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together, sturdy, cute!
customer_reviews.text: This was much easier to put together than I thought it would be! It feels sturdy and looks very cute. They grey is a very nice color. Also, my son has been biting on it for about two weeks now and none of the paint has come off at all! Big plus.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for when our granddaughter is over, because she had a hard time sleeping in the pack n play. It is great for the price and she loves sleeping in it.
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift. She has been using this for 6months and loves it. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Tinker Bell

customer_reviews.title: Great Crib!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this crib! It is strong, easy to put together and looks great! I was affraid because of the price and some reviews, but no regrets! Really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KarlaIOM

customer_reviews.title: Very simplistic and a beautiful color. After having two for about 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Very simplistic and a beautiful color. After having two for about 6 months, I have found that they aren't very sturdy. They look cheaper in person.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great crib exactly like the description. Goes perfect with our room furniture
customer_reviews.author: lauriel scott

customer_reviews.title: Good crib for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This crib is exactly what I expected. It was slightly shorter than I thought it would be but that’s just me not reading specs. This was for my third baby and I am definitely a no-frills parent. For the price this crib is worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: JB

product_meta.title: Union 2-in-1 Convertible Crib in Espresso, Greenguard Gold Certified
product_meta.description: Color:Espresso| Style:CribThe Union 3-in-1 convertible crib is a durable and chic staple for the modern nursery. With fixed side rails, non-toxic lead and phthalate-safe finish, and sturdy construction from sustainable New Zealand pine, the Union crib is a safe place for baby to rest easily. The Union crib converts to a day bed and takes a standard size crib mattress (sold separately). Meets ASTM international and US CPSC safety standards for the utmost safety. Assembled Height:33.4, Assembled Length:53.6, Assembled Width:30.2 inches.
feature_bullets: Meets ASTM international and U.S. CPSC safety standards
Non-toxic, lead and phthalate safe finish
Made with New Zealand pine wood

specifications.Material Type: Made with New Zealand pine wood
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars156 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
